documents.document: Matthews: "It's huge. A really back & forth game ... we played a really solid game. It was a really good bounce back from the last three."
Matthews on Nylander: "He was all over the puck, he was skating, he has obviously got an unbelievable shot, a really good release"
Andersen on Rielly fighting back from ankle injury: "A guy like that battling thru that is great to see. He's working hard to be on the ice"
Did new 👖 feel weird? Andersen: "No, not really, maybe restrictive a little bit moving around, but that's how it is with new gear"
Frederik Andersen on new 👖: "I'll look at the video a little bit to see how to improve some things & get them better, more & more broken in"
Did JVR flashback to '13 playoffs: "I don't even think about that anymore. That was a long time ago, a lot of different players ago."
James van Riemsdyk: "The good teams know how to handle adversity well & it was a good response game from us"
JVR on snapping skid: "At times like this you got to stick together as a team & I think we did that for the whole game"
JVR on his 1st goal: "I thought I was going to be in trouble for not getting back on the back check bc I fell at first, but puck found me"
Nylander on duel v pal Pastrňák: "It's something you never thought would happen when you're playing as little kids back home. Pretty cool."
Will Rielly (ankle) be able to feel normal the rest of the season? "Oh, yeah, I'll be alright"
Rielly on Nylander: "He's got a great shot & he likes to use it. We pretty much give him free reign to fire at Will, no pun intended."
Rielly on playing hurt: "Yeah, but we're all battling, this time of year guys want to be able to help the team & stay in the lineup"
Babcock on Rielly's high ankle sprain tweak: "I've had them before, you feel like you almost break your leg, that's how bad it hurts"
Babcock on Rielly: "He tweaked his ankle, those high ankle sprains you're going to tweak them over & over again"
Babcock with kind words for Corrado: "He was a great pro & did everything right, it's nice for him to get an opportunity"

McQuaid wears visor, Martin doesn't
Babcock: "I don't like that scenario, but it's the way it is. To me it's not fair."
Babcock on player reaction when 4-1 lead was squandered: "They just wanted to win. You got to dig in & find a way."
Babcock on Nylander: "We got to bring Pastrňák on the road w us all the time, take him to every rink, he always wants to be better than 88"
Babcock said Rielly dealing with high ankle sprain ... tweaked it tonight ... battling thru it

Leafs beat Bruins 6-5 in wild game in Boston
Good friends & former linemates Nylander (hat trick) & Pastrňák (2 go… https://t.co/LxiuG5q3ZN
Nylander (hat trick) & Pastrňák (two goals) are close friends ... quite the duel tonight in Boston midway through the second ...
William Nylander's 1st career NHL 🎩🎩🎩
Rielly back on the bench
Rielly hobbles to the room ... Morgan playing his second game since returning from right ankle injury
Here's what Freddie Andersen had to say this morning about the new goalie 👖 https://t.co/EU48V7hSj5 (vid)
Lamoriello: "We like our D, no question about that. Except for last 2 games our defensive record & what we've had has just been exceptional"
Here's the video of Lamoriello's media session; comments on Marchenko, Corrado, depth on D & trade deadline https://t.co/opCs56RZOB
Lamoriello: "We're extremely happy with our hockey team ... extremely pleased with this group & the process that ha… https://t.co/njf04ZCZy3
How active will Leafs be before #Tradecentre? Lamoriello explains why "That's an interesting question" https://t.co/96BCFMWvTr
Why does Lamoriello like Marchenko? 1. Babcock vouched for him 2. Size, strength (6'3, 210) 3. Has another year on his contract 4. Age (25)
Lamoriello: "It's unfortunate when something like this happens, but (Corrado) just wasn’t able to crack the lineup & you need depth"
Lamoriello on Corrado: "I hope Frank is given an opportunity. I hope someone picks him up. He deserves that. He’s been a solid soldier."
Matthews said his dad sent him the video ... his sister plays golf & family is really plugged into the sport https://t.co/SSaW1ge1gb
Kadri: "We’re not panicking at all. We’re still loose & what better way to get on track than getting a win against… https://t.co/7PtNDBv5d4

Leafs D at skate
Rielly-Zaitsev Gardiner-Carrick Marincin-Polak Hunwick-Corrado
Andersen starts
Leafs about "to see what we're made of" ... "We have to look in the mirror & everyone needs to battle harder" https://t.co/8KbVDha0zk (vid)
Andersen: "We're not starting to panic or anything ... everyone in this room believes we can play well & we've shown it"

Andersen: "We have to look in the mirror & everyone needs to battle harder"
Frederik acknowledges he's among those he needs to be better
Babcock: "We're better than we played, can compete harder. I'm not a big excuse guy either you deliver or you don't. We didn't get it done."
Babcock: "This is the longest (losing streak), but it's also the least determined we've probably been as well so we got to fix that"
Babcock not surprised that Leafs would lose three straight in regulation at some point, but more concerned about effort level

Babcock: "It's not a playoff game, but it will be an important game for both teams on Saturday night"
Leafs heading to Boston
Babcock:"Just like things go well for you in a hurry, they can go bad for you in a hurry so you got to decide how determined you want to be"
Babcock: "I'm in it with him. I don't have them playing at a high enough level or hard enough."
Babcock: "We had a good thing going & we were playing good & we let it slip away here & now you got to fight hard to get it back"
Rielly: "We got a lot of youth, there's no reason we shouldn't be making a strong push here, be fresh"
Rielly: "There's no excuses ... we come off the all-star break & getting ready for a big push & the first two games don't go our way"
Morgan Rielly: "There's no reason to start getting concerned. It's just a matter of getting our focus back & playing our game again"
Rielly: "We don't have a lot to be proud of right now ... if anything we have that much more motivation going into a big game (in Boston)"
Morgan Rielly: "Against a team that good you got to be mentally checked in for 60 minutes & I just don't think we were tonight"
James van Riemsdyk: "A little bit of adversity here for us, but it's a good challenge for us to see what we're made of"
For the first time this season, Leafs have lost three straight in regulation; post-game coverage on @SportsCentre now
The new Leafs lines didn't last too long ... Bozak reunited with JVR-Marner ... & Mitch scores to make it 1-0
Leafs have lost six games by 3 or more goals this season & bounced back nicely each time ... looking to do it again… https://t.co/QlICBxx66U
Really nice touch ... emotional night in St. Louis ... place was packed for pre-game ceremony ... https://t.co/n3vnH0ttMH
Marner noted he played w/ Kadri in pre-season & they had some good chemistry; 1st regular season look for the @GoLondonKnights duo tonight
Babcock hasn't juggled lines much this season ... he's tweaked lines, but rarely such a big shake-up ... looking for response tonight

Leafs warm-up lines Hyman-Matthews-Nylander JVR-Kadri-Marner Komarov-Bozak-Brown Martin-Smith-Soshnikov
So Babcock sticking with changes

Leafs D in warm-up:
Rielly-Zaitsev Gardiner-Carrick Marincin-Polak
So Hunwick scratched as Morgan returns from injury

Rielly game-time decision Smith in, Gauthier to AHL 'Slippery' Marner impresses Shattenkirk & more TOR-STL notes https://t.co/LVcEvOIhdY
Babcock on 🐐: "Got to get quicker, more assertive & take physicality he played with up here to the Marlies ... star… https://t.co/avjKS1pBPt
Blues will honour Bob Plager before tonight's game as the No. 5 is raised to the rafters in St. Louis https://t.co/0KixLoTqjm
Leafs-Blues on TSN4 tonight (regional) @GMillerTSN & @rayferrarotsn will have the call at 9 pm ET; @CEdwardsTSN producing
Interesting insight from Shattenkirk on how "slippery" Marner is in the corners ... https://t.co/zHa3NOpiF1
Babcock coy on whether new line combinations will start tonight; "I don't know if they're even making the warm-up"

Smiling Rielly: "I feel like I've had just about enough of watching"
Morgan optimistic about his chances of playing tonight
Will Rielly play tonight? "Felt good this morning, but nothing's 100% yet so we'll see at game time, but it's going in that direction"

Leafs D at skate
Marincin-Zaitsev Gardiner-Carrick Hunwick-Polak Rielly-Corrado
Mike Yeo holds his first game-day media session as Blues head coach https://t.co/XIQ3THym5n
Babcock sends msg by juggling lines Rielly inches toward return Shattenkirk lauds Leafs & more notes https://t.co/7hGF9K8ZMe
Babcock calls Hitchcock "a Hall of Fame coach ... bottom line is Hitch is still one of the best coaches in the world"
Jake Allen said Brodeur, a former teammate, "knows my game ... so it's not like I'm a foreign object to him"
Jake Allen: "I felt good last night despite the loss. I felt my game was moving forward ... hopefully keep building tomorrow"
Shattenkirk on Babcock:"You can see small details starting to feed into the franchise. When players buy in you can see how successful it is"
Kevin Shattenkirk on Babcock: "He's someone who harps on a lot of the details we know around here"
Kevin Shattenkirk on trade rumours: "It's hard to keep track of them, it really is, it changes on almost a daily basis it seems like"
Kevin Shattenkirk on trade rumours: "What happened this morning, there's more important things around here to worry about."
Kevin Shattenkirk on trade rumours: "I'm pretty used to it by now. You almost become numb to it. It's an every-day thing."
Babcock: "Your job as the coach is to get everyone to maximize their potential. Right now, that’s not the case."
Babcock on line juggling: "I didn’t want to watch the same group that started the game start practice today. How’s that."
Mike Babcock on Ken Hitchcock: "I don't believe he's going away to retire, I just don't believe that. Someone will be happy to have him."

Leafs D at practice
Marincin-Zaitsev Gardener-Carrick Hunwick-Polak Rielly-Corrado

Lines at Leafs practice
Hyman-Matthews-Nylander JVR-Kadri-Marner Komarov-Bozak-Brown Martin-Gauthier-Soshnikov Smith, Leivo

Some Hall of Fame help for Jake Allen
Brodeur on the ice at Blues practice https://t.co/TjjrMoOhKU
Gardiner on Shore's opening goal: "He beat me wide. I didn't know he had that much speed. One of those plays where I wasn't ready to play."
Jake Gardiner: "Everyone wasn't ready to go & they took advantage of it"
Bozak: "This is the time when you can't give games up like that"
Tyler Bozak: "We should've been ready & rested & we weren't ... second half of the season & this is when it gets the toughest"
Babcock: "Let's get on the flight & let's get regrouped ... that right there had to be a humbling experience for the crew"
Babcock: "Coach, players, goalies, everybody, we were bad"
Babcock asked if Andersen pull was mercy move: "Yeah, but I mean he was in there right with us too"
Babcock never addresses team post-game: "Only people I talk to is you guys so that gives me an opportunity to see how I feel in the morning"
Will Babcock burn the tape or is marathon film session on tap? "We'll see how I feel in the morning ... after I've watched the game"
Babcock: "I'm happy to take the blame ... I didn't have the guys ready, but, like, come on, let's all own up a little bit"
Babcock: "It's disappointing, actually it's surprising. Can't be very proud of the way you walk out of the rink tonight."
Babcock: "We didn't compete hard enough as a group here tonight to have any kind of success whatsoever"

Isles move within two points of Leafs
Toronto visits Brooklyn on Monday https://t.co/u2SwmuuacW
Searching for a spark Babcock has put Matthews & Marner together ... Brown shifts to the JVR-Bozak line
